sets.tps: 80 HP, 20 En, 200 M Atk, 200 Sp / 64 HP, 36 En
sets.detail:
200 Melee Attack and Brawny is to hit as hard as possible 
 200 Speed and Nimble is to be as fast as possible, and outspeeds Nimble Cosmiore-U and below 
 20 Energy = 250 Energy at level 50 for (5 Slap Downs + 1 Sharpen / 1 Shadow Sprint) (Use if not using Revival) 
 36 Energy = 253 Energy at level 50 for (4 Slap Downs + 1 Revival) (use if Revival) 
 80/64 HP is leftovers and makes Plant Essence Brawny Tahtab Timber Thrash 2HKO
sets.author: Epicly Epic Gamer

sets.tps: 20 En, 200 M Atk, 80 R Atk, 200 Sp
sets.detail:
200 Melee Attack is to hit as hard as possible with Slap Down 
 200 Speed and Nimble is to be as fast as possible, and outspeeds Nimble Cosmiore-U and below 
 80 Ranged Attack, Smart, Dark Essence and Awakening makes Dark Surge a 3HKO against Obsidrugon 
 20 Energy = 250 Energy at level 50 for (2 Slap Downs + 4 Dark Surges) (Use if not using Revival)
sets.author: Epicly Epic Gamer
